about_the_game:
Disclaimer


This game was designed, developed, and produced by a multicultural team with diverse religious beliefs, sexual orientations, genders, and political viewpoints.

This game may contain some extreme expressions, including but not limited to character dialogues, plot settings, and other content in the game. The purpose of these contents is solely to support the storyline and character development of the game and does not represent the views of the game developers or any related individuals or organizations.

The extreme statements and content in the game are purely fictional and have no connection to real-world views, beliefs, or actions. They do not represent our stance on race, gender, religion, nationality, political viewpoints, or other sensitive issues.

Game Introduction


You are correct, but "gOnshit infarct" is a brand new romance simulation visual novel developed by AGC GAMES. The game takes place in a fantasy world called "Tiamat," where chosen individuals are bestowed with the power of "Free to play" to guide the flow of memes. You will play as a mysterious character named the "Protagonist" and embark on a journey of freedom, encountering companions with unique personalities and abilities. Together, you will defeat powerful enemies, find your lost mother, and gradually uncover the truth behind "gOnshit infarct."

In the game, players will experience various wonderful endings, and whether there is a catastrophic ending to the story will depend on your exploration.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Kernel 4.2
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
